# Earthbolt (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]], [[3rd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 3]] (earth)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** Line up to close range (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 104

With a shout, you strike the ground at your feet and create a bolt of seismic force that causes earth, rock, and sand to fly into the air, striking creatures along its path. Any creatures caught in the spellâ€™s area take 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d6).

This spell functions only if you are standing on dirt, clay, sand, or stone (including stone floors), not on wooden floors or other surfaces.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 3, Wizard 3 to Level.
